quote: People make their own reality. That was what Praxis had taught him years ago. A hundred people can witness the exact same event, and give two hundred and three different accountings of it.
quote_letters: PEOPLE MAKE THEIR OWN REALITY THAT WAS WHAT PRAXIS HAD TAUGHT HIM YEARS AGO A HUNDRED PEOPLE CAN WITNESS THE EXACT SAME EVENT AND GIVE TWO HUNDRED AND THREE DIFFERENT ACCOUNTINGS OF IT
